articles.title: Unity U-turns on controversial runtime fee and begs forgiveness - TechCrunch
articles.description: Unity has done a 180 on a controversial new pricing scheme that users of its cross-platform game engine almost unanimously disparaged.
articles.content: Unity has done a 180 on a controversial new pricing scheme that users of its cross-platform game engine almost unanimously disparaged. A new pricing policy is still incoming, but it’s far less fraugh… [+2486 chars]
